EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-06-19-RD-Sponsored-Baltimore.ES-2018-06-15 Invite 1.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Baltimore IT Networking Luncheon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/baltimore-it-networking-luncheon-tickets-45735188179]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’d like to cordially invite you to join us for an exclusive networking event in Baltimore on June 19th at The Woodberry Kitchen.
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go into the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly.
Baltimore IT Networking Luncheon <[[http://bit.ly/Baltimore-vip2]]> The Woodberry Kitchen <[[http://bit.ly/Baltimore-vip2]]> Tuesday, Jun 19th | 11:30 AM <[[http://bit.ly/Baltimore-vip2]]>
Throughout the afternoon, you’ll have the chance to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud.
We hope you will join us for this discussion by registering via the link here: http://bit.ly/Baltimore-vip2 <[[http://bit.ly/Baltimore-vip2]]>
We hope to see you there.
- The Turbonomic Team
